text: Leonard Richard Merullo (May 5, 1917 - May 30, 2015) was an American professional baseball player. He played shortstop in the Major Leagues from 1941 to 1947. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Sportspeople from Boston
title: Lennie Merullo
